Putnam Exam | 1999:A1

\begin{array}{l}\n(100)-(1 x)+h(x) \\\n\quad=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}\nf(x)|-| g(x) |+h(x) & \\\n-1 & \text { if } x<-1 \\\n3 x+2 & \text { if }-1 \leq x \leq 0 \\\n-2 x+2 & \text { if } x>0\n\end{array}\right.\n\end{array}[imath](100)-(1 x)+h(x) [/imath] [imath]\quad=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}\nf(x)|-| g(x) |+h(x) & [/imath] [imath]-1 & \text { if } x<-1 [/imath] [imath]3 x+2 & \text { if }-1 \leq x \leq 0 [/imath] [imath]-2 x+2 & \text { if } x>0[/imath]
